name: Solar System - Introductory Project
description:
This is my 3D simulation of the Solar System made with Unity for the course "Game Design and Development with Unity 1: 2D Shooter" in Coursera.

I added Venus, Jupiter along with its 4 Galilean Moons, Saturn and Uranus with their rings to the original Sun, Earth and Moon made throughout the lectures.

Created by Luis Eduardo Rosales Medina
